43 template <int Dimensions>
44 bool CPrimitiveTypesSerializer::SerializeIndex(iser::IArchive& archive, istd::TIndex<Dimensions>& index)
45 {
46  bool retVal = true;
47 
48  for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
49  retVal = retVal && archive.Process(index[i]);
50  }
51 
52  return retVal;
53 }
